doc.field: Ronald Shiffman collection on the Pratt Center for Community Development
Ronald Shiffman collection on the Pratt Center for Community Development
Series 6: Housing Developments and Architectural Projects
Series 6: Housing Developments and Architectural Projects

This series includes documentation of architectural projects and design of public spaces, primarily from 1980s and 1990s in New York City. Neighborhoods represented in this series include Bedford-Stuyvesant, East New York, East Flatbush, Harlem, Times Square, and others. Projects include housing for homeless and senior citizen populations, educational facilities, parks, gardens and urban farms.
